name: Dice Girls:Lying dice
description:
I developed this game because I want to play dice with beautiful girl. I hope you can also play dice with beautiful girl happily.

The game is played in a dice game called Blow Dice, also known as Blow Dice.



Game play

Each roll once, see their own cup points, guess the other party's points, and then from the dealer began to call all participants die cup in the total number of a certain number of dice, called M N(such as 2 3 points, 2 6 points, 3 4 points, etc.);

The other party analysis to judge whether this call is true or not, the letter is true then the next home called, called the same M N, but M and N in at least one number is greater than the number of the last home called (such as, the last home called 2 5, the next home called 2 6, 3 4, 4 5 are legal);

If the next not letter is open cup verification, total all people's dice cup has the sum of the number of dice points, if there are at least M N points, then the home win, otherwise the next home win (as the home called 5 6, open cup if only 4 6 points, then the home lose, if there are 5 or more 6 points, then the next home lose).



That's it. It's a simple but fun dice game. If you win, you get the pretty girls to take off one piece of clothing.
